message:
DirectX 11 patch AND a high resolution texture pack hits on Monday. Hardware tessellation is the gorgeousest thing ever.

http://www.mycrysis.com/news/crysis_2/crysis-2-dx11-and-high-res-textures-update
I've been distracted with Wipeout Fury, but I'm almost done now with the game. Looking forward to continuing my Crysis 2 game in Dx 11 mode.
Wipeout... we still need to play that online!
I just completed the Fury expansion. Now busy with the original Wipeout HD.
I'm busy replaying everything as I lost all my save files when my 2nd PS3 died
Note to everyone:  You can backup (most) PS3 save files on a USB stick.  Do it.
I've had terrible luck with trying to back up saves. It seems that most games these days don't support it. Only way to have them backed up is to backup the entire hdd. :/

Even that won't back up saves of games that prohibit copying, will it?

The only PS3 game I've come across that doesn't permit backing up saves is Vanquish.  Mind you, I don't have an awful lot of PS3 games.
If you do a full backup of the harddrive, it copies everything, saves, install data, patches, DLC even the MP3 files you put on.
Just googled it, and apparently the only way you can transfer protected saves is via the cloud using PS+.
Yes, but does it back up "protected" save files?
Nevermind. Checked here and it seems as if you're right. http://manuals.playstation.net/document/en/ps3/current/settings/backuputility.html
Mmmm, I'm fairly sure the last time I backed up my entire drive I didn't lose a save.
The trailer for the DX11 patch, in 720p: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZgt4hA4-pc
